trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de barra de progresso do Windows contido em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> optimized for hosting in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> otimizado para hospedagem em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> level, but the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is fully accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um subconjunto de eventos e propriedades do controle hospedado são expostos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> nível, mas subjacente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> controle é totalmente acessível por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controle visualmente indica o progresso de uma operação demorada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controle exibe uma barra que preenche da esquerda para a direita com o sistema de cor de realce como uma operação progride.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control can only be oriented horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controle só pode mais ser orientado horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controle normalmente é usado quando um aplicativo executa tarefas como copiar arquivos ou impressão de documentos.

trans-unit.source: Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários de um aplicativo podem considerar um aplicativo sem resposta se não há nenhuma indicação visual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> para notificar o usuário que o aplicativo está executando uma longa de tarefa e se o aplicativo ainda está respondendo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedades definem o intervalo de valores para representar o progresso de uma tarefa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is typically set to a value of zero, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade normalmente é definida como um valor de zero e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade normalmente é definida como um valor que indica a conclusão de uma tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property could be set to the total number of files to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para exibir o progresso corretamente ao copiar um grupo de arquivos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade pode ser definida como o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade representa o progresso que fez o aplicativo para concluir a operação.

trans-unit.source: Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> only approximates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property's current value.
trans-unit.target: Como a barra exibida no controle é uma coleção de blocos, o valor exibido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> somente aproxima o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> valor atual da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Based on the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property determines when to display the next block.
trans-unit.target: Com base no tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade determina quando exibir o próximo bloco.

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> other than changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Há várias maneiras de modificar o valor exibido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> diferente alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade diretamente.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify a specific value to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property by, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> propriedade para especificar um valor específico para incrementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método para incrementar o valor.

trans-unit.source: To vary the increment value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and specify a value by which to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para variar o valor de incremento, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> método e especifique um valor pelo qual incrementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> replaces the older <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> substitui o antigo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> controle, que, mesmo assim, é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> que calcula uma sequência de números de Fibonacci.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is set to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is set to 100, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade é definida como 0, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade será definida como 100 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> estiver definida como 10.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> class with specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de tela de fundo exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento entre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> e itens adjacentes.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> valor que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height and width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura e largura do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> em pixels.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> value representing the height and width.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> valor que representa a altura e largura.

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.
trans-unit.target: O valor do incremento da posição atual da barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Avança a posição atual da barra de progresso na quantidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> método permite que você incrementar o valor da barra de progresso em uma quantidade específica.

trans-unit.source: This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de incrementar a barra de progresso é semelhante ao uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade especifica a posição atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade é maior que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> método com um valor negativo especificado no `value` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee" /> display update, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa o atraso entre cada atualização de exibição <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee" />, em milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o atraso, em milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.MarqueeAnimationSpeed%2A> property gets or sets the delay of display update.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.MarqueeAnimationSpeed%2A> propriedade obtém ou define o intervalo de atualização da exibição.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, as you decrease the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.MarqueeAnimationSpeed%2A> property, the speed of the animation increases.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, como diminuir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.MarqueeAnimationSpeed%2A> propriedade, a velocidade do aumenta a animação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite superior do intervalo definido para esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o limite superior do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 100.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica o limite superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade for alterada, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controle é redesenhado para refletir o novo intervalo de controle.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the progress bar is completely filled.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade é igual ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade, a barra de progresso é completamente preenchida.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property must be set to (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property or using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> methods) to indicate that an operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para especificar um valor que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade deve ser definida (definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade ou usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> métodos) para indicar que uma operação é concluída.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files in a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade para o número total de arquivos em uma operação de cópia de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Each time a file is copied, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que um arquivo é copiado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade pode ser aumentada por um até que o número total de arquivos é copiado.

trans-unit.source: At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled.
trans-unit.target: Nesse ponto, a barra de progresso deve ser totalmente preenchida.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> que calcula uma sequência de números de Fibonacci.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lower bound of the range that is defined for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite inferior do intervalo que está definido para esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o limite inferior do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica o limite inferior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade for alterada, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controle é redesenhado para refletir o novo intervalo de controle.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the progress bar is empty.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade é igual ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade, a barra de progresso está vazia.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of the progress bar, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor da barra de progresso, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> método, ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> que calcula uma sequência de números de Fibonacci.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The control from which to subscribe events.
trans-unit.target: O controle com base no qual assinar eventos.

trans-unit.source: Subscribes events from the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Assina eventos do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The control from which to unsubscribe events.
trans-unit.target: O controle com base no qual cancelar a assinatura de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes events from the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a assinatura de eventos do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Avança a posição atual da barra de progresso até o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método incrementa o valor da barra de progresso com o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> propriedade para especificar a quantidade de cada tarefa concluída em uma operação altera o valor da barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver copiando um grupo de arquivos, você talvez queira definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> 1 e o valor da propriedade a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade para o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the progress bar by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando cada arquivo é copiado, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método para aumentar o valor de barra de progresso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser ter um controle mais flexível, o valor da barra de progresso, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> método ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade especifica a posição atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade é maior que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> método com um valor negativo especificado no `value` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> object associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> associado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: This is a strongly typed accessor for this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: Este é um acessador fortemente tipado para este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o layout <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> é da direita para a esquerda ou da direita para esquerda quando a propriedade <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> está definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para ativar o espelhamento e definir o layout do controle da direita para a esquerda quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> está definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> propriedade para controlar o layout de aplicativos internacionais, em que o idioma é escrito da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>, mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> é de propriedade `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>, espelhamento será habilitado no posicionamento de formulário e de controle do Windows e o texto será da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> named `ToolStripProgressBar1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> chamado `ToolStripProgressBar1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which to increment the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade pela qual aumentar o valor atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" /> quando o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the incremental amount.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o valor incremental.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Blocks" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Blocks" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the display text.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o texto de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Text%2A> property, no text is shown on the control.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Text%2A> propriedade, nenhum texto é mostrado no controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor atual da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the current value.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o valor atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property must be in the range specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade deve estar no intervalo especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um uso o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> que calcula uma sequência de números de Fibonacci.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> classe.
